sink.preCopyScript: DELETE FROM dbo.stg_sales WHERE CAST(sale_ts AS date) = '@{pipeline().parameters.proc_date}';

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_ts, qty, amount_src, currency_src, amount_usd
FROM dbo.fact_sales
WHERE CAST(sale_ts AS date) = '@{pipeline().parameters.proc_date}'
